TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemBrushes extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Each property of the class is a that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to set a keyboard shortcut using the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A> property. It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.FromSystemColor%2A> method. To run this example, paste the code into a form, handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the following method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: Gets a that is the color of the application workspace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonHighlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ButtonHighlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
Docs.value: A that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonShadow As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ ButtonShadow { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.value: A that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Brush
public: static property System::Drawing::Brush ^ Highlight { System::Drawing::Brush ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a that is the color of the background of selected items.
Docs.value: A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. For example, the brush may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
